description: Gas configuration for AMM Trading Suite. All gas prices in Gwei, gasLimit in units.

notes.maxFeePerGas: Maximum total fee per gas in Gwei. Set to null for no limit (use network rate).
notes.maxPriorityFeePerGas: Tip to validators in Gwei. Higher = faster inclusion. Typical: 0.1-3 Gwei.
notes.gasLimit: Maximum gas units per transaction type. Transaction fails if exceeded.
notes.v4_note: V4 operations are generally cheaper due to singleton architecture and flash accounting.
